articles.title: Xbox Restock: Xbox Series X/S Available At Best Buy This Morning - GameSpot
articles.description: The Xbox Series X|S continues to be extremely hard to find, but we're tracking restocks in real time here.
articles.content: The Xbox Series X and Series S are two of the most popular items this holiday season, but you are likely going to have trouble finding one if you didn't preorder them as soon as they were available. … [+6702 chars]

articles.author: Sam Byford
articles.title: Nintendo completes Donkey Kong Country trilogy on Switch Online service - The Verge
articles.description: Nintendo has announced that Donkey Kong Country 3 will be added to the Nintendo Switch Online subscription service this Friday. The first and second games in the series were added earlier this year.
